entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Parry Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:54 a.m. EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.1Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 7:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
Temperature: 4.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 3.5°C
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers beginning early this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning then light late this afternoon. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h before morning. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers changing to 40 percent chance of rain showers in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
